      • addRecord

        public void addRecord(int id,
                      java.lang.String date,
                      java.lang.String descrip,
                      double amt,
                      java.lang.String recType)
               throws java.sql.SQLException,
                      DatabaseConnectionException
        Adds a new financial record to the database.
        Specified by:
        addRecord in interface IFinancialRecordService
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the employee associated with the record.
        date - the date of the record.
        descrip - the description of the record.
        amt - the amount associated with the record.
        recType - the type of the record.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
        DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
